post.body: It's 6am, the sun's shining. The wind is howling too & I'm hoping the roof stays on. Or am I? Could be interesting with no roof.
I downloaded the prince version from itunes a couple of weeks back.
sounds like Microsoft is expanding it's service offerings...
and are harem outfits provided?
are you recruiting?
would that involve us seeing any interesting tattoos?
no grog, maybe next time; I'd rather be having a baileys with you, thinking chiro-appointment thoughts (hugs)
Happy birthday Poodles :)
unless there's something actually crawling in it, then it's probably all good for the immune system
mission accomplished :)
we call that... 'passion fingers'.
Congratulations ! You has so many smartz :)
Can I lick the bowl?
It usually is safer. But it looks like just an accident with farm/gun/kids fooling around & tragic consequences.
carrot cake is on our agenda today. At least it's a way of getting vegetables into my kids digestive system.
http://www.whale.to/a/wiessinger.html
Good idea! Shall we close our lids together? One, Two, Three...oh damn, another email just came in.
You can see our lovely 'paccas at flickr.com/fejkat.
Alpaca's spit is how dominant ones tell other alpacas to 'get lost' at feeding & mating times. Sometimes humans=collateral damage.
I'm so hungry now...
hope they are ok. I know well the horrible sick feeling when that happens. I now pay flickr & upload all photos as my safety net.
Yay ! roll on January... :)
oh no! I hope things warm up for you soon!
all that techno-assembly is hard work, you know. ;)
isn't xmas such a lovely warm family time ;)
good morning !
Twitter LULZ on SMH http://tinyurl.com/6qbmlp
Bored to tears with this 'house wife' stuff. House - it's over between us. I'm talking to my lawyer.
Or maybe just a glass of vodka lemon while I'm waiting for the chamomile tea to brew.
Wound up like a coiled spring. Chamomile methinks?
Kid2 in shock and counsellors at school after sleepover shooting involving two kids in his class.
ebay goodies arriving thick and fast.
Hot water repair guy knows our dinner preferences and all my kids birthdays. We're thinking of asking him to move in.
Hot water system failed 50+ times in 6 years. I'm very skilled at kettle/bucket baths. Avoid buying from Quantum if going solar hot water.
Bucket baths! I can has cleanness! Hot water system repair guy to show up tomorrow sometime.
For those who've never experienced it, alpaca spit is actually churned up from their curdled stomach contents. It is green and vile.
I am stinky because the hot water system has failed again. And stinkier because I got alpaca spit on me at feeding time. Charming.
I feel that I should get up and do a major clean before the humidity thing kicks in this morning and sucks out any vitality still remaining.
ahhhh... fixed it :)
Having gone to m.twitter.com as per @NickHodge, now trying to work out how to turn the bloody thing off !
My ipod touch is neat but too heavy for workouts. I should have kept the nano for arm strap instead of passing down to kid2.
The tiled floor has that post-xmas kids/iceblocks humidified stickiness. Guess I better move the debris and find a mop somewhere.
Blowing up the new rubber pool boat. Going to need the sunblock today.
Merry christmas for tomorrow to my bestest US buddies! Special xmas *mwah* @mediamum & I hope you get exactly the right amount of snow.
Santa has been good to us. Spent the evening playing Simpsons Monopoly with the kids. Instead of money, the bank is a credit card machine.
Maybe I'll wait until after turkey day tomorrow.
Considering becoming vegetarian... these chocolate covered nuts will help me on my way.
I'm back again, with XP instead of Vista. Feeling like I've slipped back into something more comfortable.
Have to call tech support this morning and arrange for a new operating system to be shipped out. Back to XP for me. Offline until then :)
I broke Vista. Microsoft should employ me as an alpha tester.
Need great online recipe for cookie dough for cutting into shapes, anyone?
